roleset.name: pass into law, again
roleset.note: REPASS-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to pass.01. (from repass.01-v)

roles.note: For additional examples, see pass.01. (from repass.01-v)

role.descr: law that exists after bill's repassing

example.name: Args 0 & 1, passive
example.text: [Every order , resolution , or vote to which the concurrence of the Senate and House of Representatives may be necessary]-2...shall be repassed *-2 by two - thirds of the Senate and House of Representatives.
example.arg: by two-thirds of the Senate and House Representatives
